text: Badminton at the 2014 Asian Para Games was held at the Gyeyang Gymnasium in Incheon, South Korea from October 19 to 23, 2014. ==Medal table== ==Medalists== ===Men=== {| |- |rowspan=10|Singles |rowspan=2|SL3 |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|SL4 |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|SU5 |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|WH1 |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|WH2 |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=5|Doubles |rowspan=2|SL3–SL4 |rowspan=2| Hary Susanto Ukun Rukaendi |rowspan=2| Dwiyoko Fredy Setiawan | Md Radhi Juhari Hairul Fozi Saaba |- | Cheng Che-Lin Hsing Chih Huang |- |rowspan=2|SU5 |rowspan=2| Cheah Liek Hou Suhaili Laiman |rowspan=2| Raj Kumar Rakesh Pandey | Suryo Nugroho Imam Kunantoro |- | Pham Hong Tuan Tram Minh Nhuan |- |WH1–WH2 | Choi Jung-man Kim Sung-hun | Kim Kyung-hoon Lee Sam-seop | Junthong Dumnern Jakarin Homhual |} ===Women=== {| |- |rowspan=5|Singles |SL3 | | | |- |rowspan=2|SL4–SU5 |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- |nowrap| |- |rowspan=2|WH1–WH2 |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- |nowrap| |- |rowspan=2|Doubles |SL3–SU5 | Cheng Hefang Ma Huihui | Leani Ratri Oktila Khalimatus Sadiyah Sukohandoko | Noriko Ito Akiko Sugino |- |WH1–WH2 | Kim Yeon Sim Lee Mi-Ok | Sujirat Pookkham Amnouy Wetwithan | Lee Sun-Ae Son Ok-Cha |} ===Mixed=== {| |- |rowspan=4|Doubles |rowspan=2|SL3–SU5 |rowspan=2| Fredy Setiawan Leani Ratri Oktila |rowspan=2| Raj Kumar Parul Dalsukhbhai Parmar | Adisak Saengarayakul Chanida Srinavakul |- | Gen Shogaki Noriko Ito |- |rowspan=2|WH1–WH2 |rowspan=2| Jakarin Homhual Amnouy Wetwithan |rowspan=2| Lee Sam-seop Lee Sun Ae | Kim Jung-jun Son Ok Cha |- | Dumnern Junthong Sujirat Pookkham |} ==See also== * Badminton at the 2014 Asian Games ==References== ==External links== * incheon2014apg.org Category:2014 Asian Para Games events Category:Badminton at the Asian Para Games
